Prowess, first strike
When this creature enters, strategize.
{X}{W}, Tap X untapped creatures you control, discard a Tactic card: Copy the discarded card X times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana cost. Activate only as a sorcery.

Double strike
When Decorated Tactician enters the battlefield, strategize. (Put the top card of your tactic deck into your hand.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may strategize. If you do, discard a Tactic card.

XW, Instant
As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, discard any number of Tactic cards.
Copy each of those cards X times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.
